text: Terry Stoepel (February 8, 1945 – February 12, 2016) was an American football tight end. He played for the Chicago Bears in 1967 and for the Houston Oilers in 1970. He died on February 12, 2016, in Justin, Texas at age 71. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American football tight ends Category:Tulsa Golden Hurricane football players Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Houston Oilers players
title: Terry Stoepel
